author: tommaso
msg: OAK-2612 - made findbugs version jdk dependent (2.5.5 for 6, 3.0.0 for 7+)

author: markt
msg: Let destroy() handle the socket close if the poller has stopped in case the socket is already in the poller for a different event.

author: markt
msg: When destroy() waits for the poller to exit, it needs to account for when there are multiple pollers.

author: markt
msg: While looking at BZ 57653 I noticed a couple of places where modification to the addList and closeList was not protected by a sync. This could have led to corruption of these lists.
